contexts.context: ...don Ferdinando, infanti Castelle, filio nostro charmo <mark>Maximilianus</mark>, divina favente clementia electus Romanorum imperator semper augustus...
...divẹ memoriẹ dominus et avus noster, colmus cẹsar <mark>Maximilianus</mark>, ultra tredecim mille et ducentos florenos rhenenses,...
